Text: i cannot get this to install on my iphone. just keeps saying install failed. any sugestions?
I have an unlocked IP4 jailbroken and am struggling to get this on my phone as well.   HELP please

try using ifunbox
worked fine on my 4s

Use WinSCP or Diskaid and place the .ipa into the 'Downloads' folder inside 'Installous'.

Open Installous on your phone and install.
Do you have to jailbreak your phone to install this app?
Yes, of course you have to Jailbreak it, Genius...

to install on your device you need to bypass the code signature each app has. 
Jailbreak device  (modmyi.com/jailbreak/)
Add new source   (Cydia - Manage - Sources - Add)
                      cydia.hackulo.us/
Search for   AppSync
Choose the app that corresponds with your device ios. 
this only allows to sync cracked apps (like this) from itunes.
